metadata.title: Bering Air-Sea-Ice Study (BASICS)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: To report on air, sea and ice relationships in the Bering Sea's marginal ice zone.
